body.p:
To perform an action on a list window such as the Translation Memory List window in , you can do one of the following:
Select the appropriate item from the menu bar to access a menu of actions.
Click the icon in the toolbar representing this action. The most important tasks are represented as icons.
Open a context-sensitive popup menu where you can select the same items as from the menu bar. The menu shows only the selection of tasks that can be started from the currently active list window. You open the popup menu by pressing the right mouse button.
